Lyric:
[00:00.02]Dr.Dre - The Watcher

[00:00.52]

[00:02.39]Things just ain't the same for gangstas.

[00:02.99]Times is changing, young niggas is aging,

[00:04.96]Becoming old gees in the game and changing,

[00:07.38]To make way for these new names and faces, but

[00:09.86]The strangest things can happen from rappin, when

[00:12.63]Niggas get wrapped up in image and acting,

[00:14.98]Niggas get capped up and wrapped in plastic,

[00:17.23]Zipped up in bags when it happens, that's it.

[00:19.76]I've seen 'em come; I've watched 'em go,

[00:21.92]Watched 'em rise, witnessed it and watched 'em blow.

[00:24.69]Watched 'em all blossom and watched 'em grow.

[00:26.88]Watched the lawsuits when they lost the dough.

[00:29.31]Best friends and money: I lost them both.

[00:31.84]Went, visited niggas in the hospital.

[00:34.25]It's all the same shit all across the globe.

[00:36.77]I just sit back and watch the show. (The watcher)

[00:38.48]

[00:39.09]Chorus:

[00:39.57]Everywhere that I go

[00:41.08]Ain't the same as befo' (The watcher)

[00:43.82]People I used to know

[00:45.84]Just don't know me no more (The watcher)

[00:48.08]But everywhere that I go

[00:50.81]I got people I know (The watcher)

[00:53.23]Who got people they know

[00:55.40]So I suggest you lay low (I watch)

[00:57.45]

[00:58.06]I moved out of the hood for good, you blame me?

[01:01.47]Niggas aim mainly at niggas they can't be.

[01:04.01]But niggas can't hit niggas they can't see.

[01:06.33]I'm out of sight, now I'm out of they dang reach.

[01:08.94]How would you feel if niggas wanted you killed?

[01:11.43]You'd probably move to a new house on a new hill.

[01:13.99]And choose a new spot if niggas wanted you shot,

[01:16.49]I ain't a thug, how much Tupac in you, you got

[01:18.82]I ain't no bitch neither.

[01:20.37]It's either my life or your life,

[01:22.23]And I ain't leaving, I like breathing.

[01:23.78]Nigga we can go round for round,

[01:25.94]Clip for clip, shit, fo'-pound for pound.

[01:28.28]Nigga if you really want to take it there we can,

[01:30.61]Just remember that you fucking with a family man.

[01:33.20]I got a lot more to lose than you, remember that,

[01:35.84]When you wanna come and fill these shoes. (The watcher)

[01:38.07]

[01:38.55]Chorus:

[01:39.06]Everywhere that I go

[01:40.12]Ain't the same as befo' (The watcher)

[01:42.85]People I used to know

[01:44.89]Just don't know me no more (The watcher)

[01:47.56]But everywhere that I go

[01:50.15]I got people I know (The watcher)

[01:52.69]Who got people they know

[01:54.79]So I suggest you lay low (I watch)

[01:56.47]

[02:07.84]Things just ain't the same for gangstas,

[02:10.31]Cops is anxious to put niggas in handcuffs.

[02:12.93]They wanna hang us, see us dead, enslave us,

[02:15.25]Keep us trapped in the same place we're raised in.

[02:17.74]Then they wonder why we act so outrageous,

[02:20.02]Run around stressed out and pull out gauges.

[02:22.51]Cause everytime you let the animal out cages,

[02:24.86]It's dangerous to people who look like strangers.

[02:27.47]But now we got a new era of gangstas,

[02:30.06]Hustlers and youngsters living amongst us.

[02:32.37]Lookin at us, now calling us busters,

[02:34.91]Can't help but reminisce back when it was us.

[02:37.37]Nigga we started this gangsta shit.

[02:39.56]And this the motherfucking thanks I get?

[02:42.22]It's funny how time fly,

[02:44.49]I'm just having fun, just watching it fly by. (The watcher)

[02:46.88]

[02:47.29]Chorus:

[02:47.83]Everywhere that I go

[02:49.13]Ain't the same as befo' (The watcher)

[02:51.35]People I used to know

[02:53.91]Just don't know me no more (The watcher)

[02:56.10]But everywhere that I go

[02:58.68]I got people I know (The watcher)

[03:01.61]Who got people they know

[03:03.59]So I suggest you lay low (I watch)

[03:06.33]

[03:11.32](The watcher)

[03:11.93]

[03:12.81]End

[03:13.72]

[03:15.02]Dr.Dre - The Watcher

[03:18.52]
